comments: When creating an issue we get a 500 error. Trace id=abc123. Backend logs show NullPointerException.
User reports "cannot reproduce" on our side. Steps: enter credentials, hit login. No logs found.
Customer reports SLA breach, response time exceeded 30s multiple times.
Multiple timeouts (504) observed after deployment. Suspect upstream timeout config.
Labels not migrated for some issues; occurs on bulk import. Attached sample payload.
Users see 502 Bad Gateway when hitting /checkout. Correlate with gateway traces.
Issue resolved after hotfix, closing. Verified by QA.
Please assign to @backend-team for investigation and debugging.
